name: Immaterial
description: Immaterial is VR puzzle game for the HTC Vive. In Immaterial the player is brought into a simulation to test for edge cases in virtual reality. The player uses their physical environment and exploits the Vive in order to solve these puzzles that would normally be impossible. The player’s in-game abilities are limited to picking up objects and pressing buttons but the real mechanics of the game are how the player uses their controllers, headset and physical environment. The solutions to the puzzles are the creative ways the player cheats virtual reality.  As the player performs tasks in the simulation, the simulation itself starts to break, raising the stakes.
